text: Yothin FA Group (โยธิน เอฟ.เอ.กรุ๊ป) is a Thai Muay Thai fighter. ==Biography and career== Yohtin started fighting at 5 years old and was training at Sakaethongresort gym in the Isan region until he was scouted by FA Group gym. Yothin tries to walk in the steps of a knee fighter from the same gym Petchboonchu FA Group under the same teacher Kru Diesel. From March 2016 to march 2017 Yothin had 8 victories and only 1 defeat which led him to be on the shortlist for the Thailand Sports Writers Fighter of the Year Award. Yothin went on an extended winning streak in the Rajadamnern Stadium and was ranked #1 but was not rewarded by a title shot. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2016 True4u Muaymumwansuek 118 lbs Champion ==Fight record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
